attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this green tax on air travel is totally unfair . i booked my holiday 4 months ago and agreed on a price, now i am told that because of green tax my holiday will cost more than i thought. i scrimp for a holiday once a year, now it looks like i won't be able to go abroad anymore, i'll have to look elsewhere for a cheep holiday. i really can't afford to go away anymore, looks like holiday's are out of the question. unlike those in government who choose thiere own wage and go off every 6 weeks or so for a month at a time, and we pick up the bill, hitting the poor every time, whether it's our holiday or theire's. we're the one's that have to give everything up, because we're the one's that can't afford it. talk about sod you jack i'm alright.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
